Articles.Content:
Hello!

I'm the Big Orange Machine! You might know me from my other KSP Posts such as Checklist Generator and the Khermira (0.25).

Today I got sick of always tweaking and re-calculating my precise manouver nodes after I determine my planetary encounters; so I built this tool.

The Kerbal Ion Node Calculator.  It'll allow you to recalculate your long maneuvers into smaller segments based off inputs such as how long it takes your battery to charge and how long you can burn for until you have to stop again.

Its obviously could use some UI tweaks (I know minutes instead of seconds!) but I hope someone else can find it as helpful as I do!
